creator: linamaes
sql: SELECT PRINTF('%04d-%02d', "year", "month") AS yearMonth, GBIF_EEARGCode(10000, decimalLatitude, decimalLongitude, COALESCE(coordinateUncertaintyInMeters, 10000)) AS eeaCellCode, basisOfRecord, datasetKey, countryCode, speciesKey, species, family, class, order_, COUNT(*) AS occurrences FROM occurrence WHERE occurrenceStatus = 'PRESENT' AND "year" >= 1900 AND "year" <= 2024 AND continent = 'EUROPE' AND speciesKey IN (2480578, 4408405, 4408410, 2493124, 2493114, 5739298, 5229165) AND hasCoordinate = TRUE AND (coordinateUncertaintyInMeters <= 10000 OR coordinateUncertaintyInMeters IS NULL) AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'ZERO_COORDINATE') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_OUT_OF_RANGE') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_INVALID') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COUNTRY_COORDINATE_MISMATCH') AND "month" IS NOT NULL GROUP BY yearMonth, eeaCellCode, basisOfRecord, datasetKey, countryCode, speciesKey, species, family, class, order_ ORDER BY yearMonth DESC, eeaCellCode ASC, countryCode ASC
